Interesting fact outside scope:
three options under returning you ballot: Mail your ballot – using the provided postage paid envelope. Be sure to complete the Voters declaration.
Use the secure drop box, located in front of the Erie County Courthouse. The drop box is available 24/7. Be sure to complete the Voters declaration.
Hand deliver your ballot to the Voters Registration office. Be sure to complete the Voters declaration.
Hours of Operation: The drop box is open 24/7. Contact the voter registeration office for hours
8:00 am until 4:00 pm, Monday through Friday.
